p: COVID-19 was categorized as a cold and dampness epidemic ( Sun et al., 2020), and the pathogenic factors are found in the body's mucous membranes ( Han et al., 2020). Dampness should be paid more attention to in this epidemic ( Li et al., 2020; Zheng et al., 2020). The complexity of COVID-19 lies in the fact that damp evil is dominant and dryness evil is contained ( Fan et al., 2020).
